White_Plains.Ardsley Country Club:
The Ardsley Country Club or Ardsley Club is a country club in the United States. It was founded in August 1895 to "cater to industrialists" such as Amzi Barber, J. P. Morgan, the Rockefeller brothers, and Cornelius Vanderbilt.


== History ==


=== Original development ===
In 1892, Amzi L. Barber bought the property known as "Ardsley Towers" in Irvington, New York.
